comment: very sweet and funny woman. super easy class, though i will say that she can be just a little disorganized in the sense that we are always rushing to get ready for our concerts because she takes way too long to choose and give us the music we are playing for our concert, leading to us not having enough time to prepare.

Professor Conley does not know what she is talking about. She is very last minute, unorganized, and we get nothing done at the end of the class. She wings every class and expect us to have assignments done that she posted last minute. She gets frustrated with the class when it is her fault from lack of planning.

I LOVE being in Dr. Conley's class. She is so much fun and cares about each and one of her students. She makes class so much fun but at the same time pushes us to be a little bit each day. I would definitely take Dr. Conley again and again.
Great professor, very passionate and is a lot of fun.
